directions: Cook the kale in a large, covered saucepan over medium-high heat until the leaves wilt. Once the volume of the kale is reduced by half, uncover and stir in the garlic, olive oil and vinegar. Cook while stirring for 2 more minutes. Add salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 1 bunch kale, stems removed and leaves coarsely chopped
Salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Italian Kale
